timeline.message: [io] commit progress on new generic import API
SO-4346: add CodeSystemURI based build methods

[core] add hasChanges to CommitResult

Make commitTimestamp primitive.
SO-4346: improve Import Defect API

timeline.bodyText: Are floating point dots/commas and negative signs allowed? Maybe E for powers of 10? 😃

replies.bodyText: Let's keep it simple for the initial release, but this would be great to support.

Suggested change

timeline.message: SO-4346: add Serializable to ImportDefect
SO-4346: return warn/info defects as part of the success result
SO-4346: log error when request return null response body
SO-4346: clean up in ImportRequest

Update core/com.b2international.snowowl.core/src/com/b2international/snowowl/core/request/io/ImportRequest.java

Co-authored-by: András Péteri <apeteri@b2international.com>
SO-4346: fix log statement substitution
SO-4346: fix unused format argument
SO-4346: support optionalService up to the root context

SO-4346: fall back to Locks.lockContext if parentLockContext not defined

...in RepositoryTransactionContext (requires outer wrapping of Locks)

For any other inner logic that uses `TransactionContext` interface with
a custom made lock should still delegate its lockContext to the
`TransactionContext.commit(...)` calls.
SO-4346: move finished log message before sending back response
Merge branch '7.x' into improvements/import-api-refactor
Merge branch '7.x' into improvements/import-api-refactor

Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/7.x' into
improvements/import-api-refactor

Conflicts:
	core/com.b2international.snowowl.core/src/com/b2international/snowowl/core/repository/RepositoryTransactionContext.java
SO-4346: Use ImportDefectBuilder for RF2 content validation
SO-4346: Restrict maximum collected defects in ImportDefectAcceptor

SO-4346: Use generic ImportResponse in SnomedRf2ImportRequest

- Update Rf2GlobalValidator to use an import defect collecting instance
- Update Rf2ValidationIssueReporter to collect defects by source file
- Collect visited component URIs in Rf2EffectiveTimeSlice
- Update SnomedCommand after API change
- Set ImportStatus based on ImportResponse in SnomedRf2ImportService
SO-4483: support `dryRun` in RF2 import Java/REST APIs
SO-4346: Validate effective time slices in reverse chronological order

SO-4346: Create a copy of the HTreeMap's key set

One-time iteration of the key set is fast, but single "contains" checks
are comparatively very slow.
SO-4346: Register only concepts and reference sets in visited components

SO-4346: Treat empty "when" conditions as defects in...

...ImportDefectBuilder; the "error", "warn", "info" shortcuts in
ImportDefectAcceptor won't register a defect otherwise.
SO-4346: Initialize defect location field with an empty string
Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/7.x' into improvements/import-api-refactor

timeline.bodyText: I suggest returning all defects from the API and limiting visualization on user interfaces instead.
timeline.author: cmark
